answer:
In BC, services vary by location. Use our health unit finder to locate the Interior Health community health centre closest to you. Contact them and ask when an intake nurse is available to review your immunization records and complete your school form. 
Immunization Nurse
answer_formatted:
## In BC, services vary by location.


## Use our health unit finder to locate the Interior Health community health centre closest to you.

Contact them and ask when an intake nurse is available to review your immunization records and complete your school form.
Immunization Nurse
question: Hello, I am a student at the Okanagan College and they need an immunization record signed by a Health care provider. Can I go to the Health unit for this? I have gathered all the immunization proofs. Thank you!
question_variation_0: what to sign for immunization record in health unit
question_variation_1: can i go to okanagan college to get immunization signed health care provider
question_variation_2: what is the immunization record needed for okanagan
